Main.title: What is DroMii?
Main.description: WE TAKE Geo-Spatial Data FROM ABOVE
Main.description2: Effective and Efficient Method for collecting Data by using Drone
Main.description3:
Drone surveying is way more productive than traditional types of surveying. 
 It can be used in various fields, including road maintenance, environment, and future industries. 
 Try DroMii's platform to get the information you want with URL, without software.

Platform.title: PLATFORM
Platform.description:
Various spatial information and services are provided through video information captured by drones. 
 You can easily use them anytime, anywhere.
Platform.DaaS:
Provides 3D and Pano from drone images that are used for building 
spatial information.
Provides an efficient way to get results through URL by producing a variety of analyses and reports.
Platform.DTM:
Utilize machine learning on the basis of road information taken with road drones.
Predicts and manages the status of various facilities and provides the connection with existing systems
Platform.CfSM: Creates car-free, high-precision maps based on DTM AI
Platform.AfGG:
AfGG solution creates an HDS
(High-Definition Safety) Map 
with road marking information.
AfGG solution utilizes DTM ML to auto label the road markings (double yellow line, crosswalk, stop line, etc.) or detect risk factors (pothole, crack, etc.) 
to gather road information.

Advantages.Convenient:
Provides 3D and Pano from drone images
that are used for building spatial information
in a form of URL for easier access to analyses and reports.
Uploads the images taken for building 3D spatial
data to the platform with simple 'drag & drop'.
Advantages.Automation:
The whole process automated with a parallel processing-based network provides various data analysis and reports.
Makes HTML5-based results from several images going through 360Â° Panoramic platform and a real-time auto-process (with mosaic and color correction process, etc.), which automatically sends the result to users in any OS & device.
Advantages.DeepLearning:
Based on drones, artificial intelligence, big data, and blockchain, DTM provides a state-based management optimization system for various facilities and connections with existing systems.
Based on DTM ML, it removes cars using deep learning algorithms, and those integrated images are combined to make car-free street maps.
